subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rick DiPietro turned aside 30 shots and Alexei Yashin scored the decisive goal last night for the Islanders in a 5-2 victory over the slumping Chicago Blackhawks
snippet: Rick DiPietro turned aside 30 shots and Alexei Yashin scored the decisive goal last night for the Islanders in a 5-2 victory over the slumping Chicago Blackhawks
